QuestData.Title: Along the Riverside
QuestData.Description: Durotan has taken most of our forces west. He's establishing a forward base along the Skysong River.$B$BHe'll want to know that we're almost ready to move against Grommashar.$B$BI'm sure he'll also appreciate your help dealing with the Warsong orcs at Lok-rath.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Durotan at Riverside Post.
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to see you, commander. When I'd heard about your garrison caravan being destroyed....$B$BWell, let's just say that I feared the worst.$B$BWhat word from Wor'var?
